name: Let Sleeping Dragons Lie
description:
Made for Mini Jam 85

Theme: Gold 

Limitation: One-minute Timer

Play as a dungeon-crawling thief who set his sights on a dragon's hoard!

Fullscreen recommended for browser playing.

Windows build recommended.

Controls:

Use WASD to move left and right, spacebar to jump, and CTRL to crouch. Walking on gold will raise the dragon's detection level, standing still will reduce the detection level. If the dragon awakens, crouch before you get in his line of sight to avoid being spotted! 

You only have a minute to get as much treasure as you can before the dragon smells you and finds you. Head back to the cave entrance whenever you're ready to leave with your loot.
